paper_abstract: Nowadays, in convergence of European university studies, the syllabus of the Marine Engineer University studies in Spain employs considerable time to study Applied Thermodynamics. Engineering Equation Solver (EES) was chosen as the best answer. In order to validate this solution, a case study was performed. (C) 2009 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Comput Appl Eng Educ 19: 647-650, 2011; View this article online at wileyonlinelibrary.com/journal/cae; DOI 10.1002/cae.20348
paper_title: Computer Software for Reducing the Learning Time of Marine Engineers
